summary: A tough kid comes to a new high school and begins muscling his way into the drug scene. This is a typical morality play of the era, filled with a naive view of drugs, nihilistic beat poetry, and some incredible '50s slang.
cast: Russ Tamblyn|Jan Sterling|John Drew Barrymore|Mamie Van Doren|Jerry Lee Lewis|Ray Anthony|Jackie Coogan|Charles Chaplin Jr.|Diane Jergens|Burt Douglas|Michael Landon|Jody Fair|Phillipa Fallon|Robin Raymond|Lyle Talbot|James Todd|William Wellman Jr.|Texas Joe Foster|Diana Darrin|Carl Thayler|Irwin Berke|Mel Welles|Louis Cavalier|Kim Chance|Steve Drexel|Steve Ellis|Florida Friebus|Norman Grabowski|Charles Halton|Nora Hayden|Charles Horvath|Loren Janes|Helen Jay|Kevin Kelly|Donald Kerr|Helen Kleeb|Rusty Lane|Joe Lanza|Della Malzahn|Norman Ollestad|Jacqueline Park|Regis Parton|Gil Perkins|Carmen Phillips|Kathy Reed|Ralph Reed|Kay Reid|Leoda Richards|Steffi Sidney|Russell Smith Jr.|William Smith|Phyllis Standish|William Vaughn|Pierre Watkin|James Westmoreland|Ned Wever
title: High School Confidential!
